Preliminary discourses and meditations of the sins for which God hath first and last brought the judgment of fire -- Physical contemplations of the nature, and natural-causes of fire, morally applied -- Sixty one meditations, and reflections upon the most remarkable passages and circumstances of the late dreadful fire -- Twenty seven meditations consisting of counsel and comfort to direct and support Christians under outward troubles.
